text: The Swadhin Bangal Biplobi Parishad was an underground student political group organized in 1961 by Mujibur Rahman, the founder of Bangladesh. The group worked to oppose the military rule of Ayub Khan (Field Marshal). It also worked for more autonomy and the independence of East Pakistan as Bangladesh. Category:1960s establishments in Bangladesh Category:1961 establishments in Asia Category:Nationalist organizations in Bangladesh
title: Swadhin Bangal Biplobi Parishad
